title: #210: Forensically Deconstructing Jeffrey Epstein Part 6
description:
We continue our deep dive analysis of Episode #5 of Wondery's six part series "The Mysterious Mr Epstein" and Epstein's behaviour and the network that enabled him. With a half-billion-dollar budget, and a decision to allow a convicted sex offender, Epstein, to spend six out of seven days of his sentence on "work release' in direct conflict with their sex offender policy, this episode focuses on Palm Beach County and the man in charge, Sheriff Ric Bradshaw. 


We analyse the critical issues raised by John Mark Dougan, a former marine and former Deputy Sheriff at the Palm Beach County Sheriff's Office along with Michael Reiter former Palm Beach Police Chief, 2001-2009. You won't want to miss this episode.


#Epstein

#ChildSexTrafficking

#SerialPerpetrator

#UnmaskTheAbusers
